premium.heroSubtitle: Join now to enjoy an exceptional learning experience, exclusive benefits, and top-tier service.

freeTier.title: Free
freeTier.subtitle: Limited access with ads and a restricted number of episodes.

premiumTier.title: Premium
premiumTier.subtitle: The complete experience: all features and more.
premiumTier.bullet2: Full access to all games including weekly/monthly quizzes
premiumTier.bullet3: Cloud sync ‚Äì continue from any device
premiumTier.bullet6: Priority support and early access to features

adFree.title: üåü Ad-Free Experience
adFree.summary: Learn without distractions and stay focused.
adFree.details: With Premium, you enjoy a completely ad-free site. Your time is valuable ‚Äì we make sure every second supports your learning.

unlimitedAccess.title: üì∫ Full Access to All Episodes and Languages
unlimitedAccess.summary: Watch and learn without any restrictions.
unlimitedAccess.details: Premium lets you access every show, every episode, and practice in any source/target language freely ‚Äì no limits.

exclusiveContent.title: üîí Exclusive Content
exclusiveContent.summary: Videos, exercises, and resources just for subscribers.
exclusiveContent.details: Get access to advanced vocabulary drills, guided videos, PDF workbooks, podcasts and more ‚Äì all exclusive to Premium members.

prioritySupport.title: üìû Priority Support
prioritySupport.details: Premium users get faster responses to questions, technical support, and full access to our dedicated support team 24/7.

earlyAccess.title: üöÄ Early Access to New Features
earlyAccess.summary: Try new tools before anyone else.
earlyAccess.details: Premium users are the first to enjoy new tools, designs, and AI learning features. Help shape the future of StudyWatch!

cloudSave.title: ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud Backup
cloudSave.summary: Your progress and favorites are always safe.
cloudSave.details: Every word, note, or series you save is stored securely in the cloud so you can access it from any device at any time.

unlimitedFavorites.title: üìö Unlimited Favorites
unlimitedFavorites.summary: Save as many words and shows as you want.
unlimitedFavorites.details: Unlike the free version, Premium has no limit. Build your full vocabulary bank and series collection without restrictions.

games.title: üéÆ Full Game Access
games.details: Access every game ‚Äì memory, sentence building, and advanced quizzes to test your progress every week or month.

first1000.title: üéÅ 3 Months Free for the First 1,000

first1000.details: To celebrate our launch, the first 1,000 users to subscribe will get full Premium access for 3 months, completely free ‚Äì no commitment.

future.title: üöÄ Coming Soon: New Features
future.details: We're building new content, smarter AI, group learning tools and more. Premium users will always be the first to try.

faq.q1: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a1: Yes, you can cancel any time directly from your profile settings.
faq.a2: Yes, but you can turn off auto-renewal before your next billing cycle.
faq.q3: Is there a discount for annual subscriptions?
faq.a3: Yes, annual subscribers get 20% off the monthly rate.
faq.q4: Can I use my Premium account on multiple devices?
faq.a4: Absolutely! You can stay logged in on up to 3 devices at the same time.

premium.footerText: Don‚Äôt miss out ‚Äì join today and enjoy all our exclusive Premium features!
